1002.description: Fire **2** missiles with each attack, dealing damage to the target. Each missile deals damage equal to **34.8%** of ATK.

1005.description: Fire **4** missiles with each attack, dealing damage to the target. Each missile deals damage equal to **34.8%** of ATK.

1006.description: Reduce physical damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1007.description: Colossus Arm lasts for **30** seconds. All damage taken for this duration is reduced by **20%**.

1008.description: Slow enemies that pass through the shield by **50%** for **2** seconds.

1013.description: Reduce frost damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1014.description: When Wanderers or allies pass through the Omnium Shield, damage dealt increases by **25%** for **7** seconds.

1022.description: When piloting the armor, gain immunity to flame damage and control effects.

1023.description:
Gain the **Artillery Fire** skill.
**Artillery Fire**: Fire **6** times at the locked-on target. Each hit deals damage equal to **155.2%** of ATK.

1026.description: When piloting the armor, dealing damage also inflicts burn.

1027.description: Increase flame damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1028.description:
Gain the **Flame Domain** skill.
**Flame Domain**: Erect a wide-range Flame Domain at the current location, dealing damage equal to a maximum of **1,146.8%** of ATK.

1029.description: Enemies caught within the rift who are close to the ground are unable to dodge, and the vacuum duration is increased to **15** seconds.

1032.description: Increase damage dealt to targets in the area by **20%**.

1034.description: Reduce flame damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1035.description: Enemies within the rift are unable to receive any healing.

1036.description: Stun targets for **3** seconds. Cooldown: **180** seconds.

1037.description: Increase damage dealt by energy pulses by **30%**.

1041.description: Increase physical damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1042.description: Trigger a seismic wave every **3** seconds, **suspending targets**. The waves can be dodged by jumping.

1050.description: Remove all control effects and grant immunity to control effects for the next **5** seconds.

1054.description: Every **5** seconds, additionally grant Wanderers one stack of inspiration, increasing damage dealt by **5%** per stack.

1055.description: Reduce volt damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1056.description: The Wanderer's attacks convert **20%** of damage dealt into HP for the duration of the drone.

1067.description: Increase damage dealt by holograms to **75%** of the Wanderer's damage.

1068.description: Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.

1069.description: Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1070.description: Increase damage dealt by holograms to **100%** of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.

1088.description: Gain the **Laser Matrix** skill: Freeze targets after dealing damage to them **4** times in a row and deal damage equal to a maximum of **93.2%** of ATK.

1090.description: Increase frost damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1091.description: Gain the **Crash** skill: Deal damage to the target equal to **55.9%** of ATK and stun them for **0.5** seconds.

1107.description: Replenish 1 charge every **100** seconds. Gliding no longer expends endurance.

1109.description: Gliding for longer than 3 seconds empowers the next pummel attack to stun the target for 2 seconds.

1111.description: Reduce physical damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1114.description: **Stun** targets for **2** seconds on hit, and burn them.

1118.description: Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1119.description: **Stun** targets for **3** seconds on hit and tire them for **10** seconds, causing targets to lose **100** endurance after every ability use.

1121.description: Gain **10** weapon charge points every second while gliding.

1124.description: Jetboard collision damage is increased by **100%**, and charge time is reduced to **45** seconds.

1125.description: Reduce frost damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1126.description: Immune to control effects while using the Jetboard. Using the Jetboard to attack and hit targets **stuns** them for **5** seconds. Charge time is reduced to **30** seconds.

1132.description: Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1133.description: Those caught in tornadoes have a **50%** chance to be disoriented for **3** seconds each time they take damage. Movement direction inputs will also be swapped.

1144.description: +**100%** damage in Quantum state, negated after **1** successful attack.

1146.description: Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1147.description: +**100%** damage in Quantum state, negated after **3** successful attacks.

1148.description: Number of missiles launched increases every second.

1153.description: Increase physical damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1154.description: Number of missiles launched every second is further increased.

1155.description: Produce an EM shield that reduces damage taken by **20%** for **7** seconds.

1160.description: Increase frost damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1161.description: Reduce final damage of targets hit by **30%** for **7** seconds.

1162.description: Can be used while under control effects.

1165.description: Grant immunity to control effects for the next **5** seconds.

1166.description: Upon hitting the target, plant a **7**-second Magnetic Bomb that detonates if the target uses normal attacks/dodges/skills, causing **40%** Slow for **5** seconds, and disappears after detonation.

1167.description: Reduce volt damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1168.description: Detonating the Magnetic Bomb removes all current buffs from the target.

1188.description: When the shield is broken, reduce the speed of the attacker and nearby enemies by **35%** for **6** seconds.

1190.description: After the shield breaks or ends, increase final damage by an amount equal to the percentage of HP lost. This lasts for **10** seconds. Increase damage by a minimum of **30%**.

1191.description: After the shield breaks or ends, increase speed by **30%** for **6** seconds.

1192.description: Reduce flame damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1193.description: When the shield breaks, gain a **5**-second damage reflection effect, reflecting **0.6**× damage taken back at the attacker.

1195.description: Allied Wanderers in the dimension recovers **15%** HP **8** seconds later.

1196.description: Allied units in the dimension gain **25%** lifesteal.

1199.description: Allied Wanderers in the dimension gain immunity to all control effects.

1200.description: Increase frost damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1201.description: Until the Relic disappears, allied Wanderers in the dimension double all lifesteal effects when HP drops to **40%** or below.

1202.description: After activating the Strange Cube, increase damage dealt by **10%** for **10** seconds.

1205.description: After activating the Strange Cube, reduce weapon charge of nearby enemies by **200**.

1207.description: Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1208.description: After activating the Strange Cube, gain weapon charge based on HP lost. For every **1%** of HP lost, gain **10** weapon charge.

1209.description: Increase duration of energy pillars to **30** seconds.

1212.description: Increase endurance regen speed by 30% for **20** seconds after switching to the Omnium Handcannon.

1214.description: Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1236.description: Grant **100** energy immediately upon use if HP is greater than **90%**. If HP is less than **90%**, immediately grant **50** energy, then **50** more energy once the damage increase expires.

1237.description: Increase the duration of Type II Couant's damage boost to **12** seconds.

1238.description: Increase Type II Couant's damage boost limit to **70%**.

1239.description: Increase flame damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1240.description: If the amount of missing HP is greater than the current HP, grant a damage boost based on a percentage of missing HP (up to **70%**).

1241.description: When the shield is broken, reduce the speed of the attacker and nearby enemies by **35%** for **6** seconds.

1242.description: After the shield breaks or ends, increase final damage by **20%** for **10** seconds.

1243.description: After the shield breaks or ends, increase speed by **30%** for **6** seconds.

1244.description: Reduce flame damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1245.description: When the shield breaks, gain a **5**-second damage reflection effect, reflecting **0.6**× damage taken back at the attacker.

1249.description: Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1250.description: Those caught in tornadoes have a **50%** chance to be disoriented for **3** seconds each time they take damage. Movement direction inputs will also be swapped.

1251.description: **Stun** targets for **2** seconds on hit, and burn them.

1254.description: Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1255.description: **Stun** targets for **3** seconds on hit and tire them for **10** seconds, causing targets to lose **100** endurance after every ability use.

1257.description: Endurance cost is halved on the ground, no cost in the water.

1259.description: Increase flame damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1262.description: Reduce availability for each dice to **20** seconds.

1263.description: **Thermonuclear** Damage Boost: Gain a **25%** damage boost for **45** seconds.

1264.description: After each roll of dice, there is a **50%** chance of getting 1 die. Cooldown: **15 seconds**.

1265.description: Increase frost damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1266.description: Rolling **3** dice will grant all the elemental damage boosts. If their sum is **14** or more, gain the **Overclock** effect.

1269.description: Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.

1270.description: Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1271.description: Increase damage dealt by holograms to **50%** of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.

1273.description: Recover to full endurance when using the Mini Pelican, not effective when exhausted.

1274.description: The Mini Pelican can store up to **3** charges.

1275.description: Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1276.description: Reduces cooldown to **30** seconds and unlocks the Mini Pelican paint: **Pigmentation**.

1278.description: While **Micro Attack** is active, increase damage dealt against grievous targets by **20%**.

1280.description: Increase physical damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1281.description: Restore HP to full when marking a weapon with Overdrive Shot. Restore HP equal to **20%** of Max HP instead in Apex League.

1282.description: Grant **100** energy immediately upon use if HP is greater than **90%**. If HP is less than **90%**, immediately grant **50** energy, then **50** more energy once the damage increase expires.

1283.description: Increase the duration of damage boost to **12** seconds.

1284.description: Every stack of blessing additionally increases final damage by **1%** for **12** seconds.

1285.description: Increase flame damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1286.description: When there are a full 5 stacks of blessing, additionally increase final damage by **2.5%** and reduce damage received by **5%** for **12** seconds.

1288.description: While **Micro Attack** is active, increase damage dealt against grievous targets by **20%**.

1291.description: Restore HP to full when marking a weapon with Overdrive Shot. Restore HP equal to **20%** of Max HP instead in Apex League.

1292.description: Thalassic Heart will raise the tide **1** time every **15** seconds, dealing damage equal to **15%** (**1.5%** in Apex League) of the Wanderer's Max HP to nearby targets.

1293.description: Thalassic Heart duration is extended to **90** seconds.

1294.description: Damage dealt to targets hit by Thalassic Heart is additionally increased by **5.5%**.

1295.description: Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1296.description:
While diving, use Thalassic Heart to transform into a dolphin for up to **45** seconds, during which enemies will not attack for **15** seconds, and movement speed will be increased.
While transformed, the next attack will thrash the seawater, dealing damage equal to **25%** (**2.5%** in Apex League) of your Max HP to nearby targets, and will end the transformation.

1298.description: Restore HP to full when marking a weapon with Overdrive Shot. Restore HP equal to **20%** of Max HP instead in Apex League.

1300.description: Increase physical damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1301.description: While **Micro Attack** is active, increase damage dealt against grievous targets by **4%**.

1302.description: Zephyr duration is extended to **30** seconds.

1303.description: In the zephyr state, speed on the ground and walls is increased by **15%** and jump height is increased.

1304.description: Speedwalkers can store up to **2** charges.

1305.description: Reduce physical damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1306.description: During zephyr, each hit from aerial attacks recovers dodge attempts and aerial dodges recover all endurance.

1307.description: Increase the number of small bubbles fired. The wielder also moves backward when firing small bubbles. After firing the relic, increase speed by **10%** for **30** seconds.

1308.description: Gain **1** / **3** stacks of Happy Time after firing small and large bubbles, respectively. Each stack increases the Wanderer's damage dealt by **1.8%** for **60** seconds, stacking up to **5** times.

1309.description: Use the Bubble Gun to summon a Bubble Spirit that fires bubbles and refreshes the duration of Happy Time. The Spirit lasts **150** seconds.

1310.description: Increase flame damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1311.description: Increase the Happy Time damage boost by an additional **0.6%** per stack.

1312.description: Unlocks Mask of the Hunter. Select when using Triple Mask and confirm again to wear. While Mask of the Hunter is worn, you can view the locations of elite achievement enemies in Domain 9 on the map.

1313.description: While Triple Mask is deployed, speed is increased by **8%** and elemental damage is increased by **8%**.

1314.description: Unlocks Mask of the Knowledge. While Mask of the Knowledge is worn, when there is an unopened chest nearby, you will be prompted and guided to the location of the chest.

1315.description: Increase frost damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1316.description: While Triple Mask is deployed, elemental damage is additionally increased by **8%**.
